title: Digital Shadows
caption: Cyberbullying leaves digital footprints. Words online can have real-world consequences. Think before you post. Protect yourself and others. Be kind online.
prompt: A shadowy figure partially obscured by pixelated code, representing the hidden nature of cyberbullying. Emphasis on the digital aspect with binary code and glowing lines.

title: The Weight of Words
caption: Words matter, online and off. A single message can cause immense pain. Choose your words carefully. Spread positivity, not negativity. Report harmful content.
prompt: A stylized image of a heart being weighed down by digital text bubbles containing negative or hurtful words. A balance scale with one side heavier than the other.

title: Break the Cycle
caption: Cyberbullying is a cycle. Recognize the signs and break free. Support victims and stand up to bullies. Together, we can create a safer online world.
prompt: A visual representation of a broken chain, each link representing an act of cyberbullying. Sunlight shining through the broken links, symbolizing hope and prevention.

title: Connect and Support
caption: You're not alone. Connect with trusted adults, friends, or online resources. Talking about it can make a difference. Seek help if you're being cyberbullied.
prompt: A network of interconnected hands reaching out to each other across a digital landscape. A sense of community and support represented visually.

title: Shield Your Profile
caption: Protect your privacy online. Adjust your privacy settings. Be mindful of what you share. Control your digital footprint.
prompt: An image of a social media profile being shielded by a protective barrier or force field. Focus on security and online safety.

title: Report and Block
caption: Don't tolerate cyberbullying. Report abusive behavior to social media platforms. Block bullies and cut off their access. Take control of your online experience.
prompt: A prominent 'Report' and 'Block' button overlayed on a generic social media interface. Emphasis on taking action against cyberbullying.

title: Digital Empathy
caption: Practice digital empathy. Imagine how your words might affect others. Treat everyone online with respect. Be a positive influence.
prompt: Two hands, one offering a comforting gesture to the other through a digital screen or device. Focusing on compassion and understanding online.

title: Rise Above the Noise
caption: Ignore the negativity. Focus on positive interactions. Don't engage with cyberbullies. Rise above the noise and choose kindness.
prompt: A figure standing tall and strong amidst a storm of digital text and negativity. A sense of resilience and choosing to focus on positivity.

title: Be an Upstander
caption: Don't be a bystander. Speak up against cyberbullying. Support victims and let them know they're not alone. Be an upstander, not a silent witness.
prompt: A group of diverse individuals standing together, united against a common threat (represented symbolically). Emphasis on solidarity and taking a stand.
